name: Torr-penn: challenge your brain!
description:
Goal : Use clues to complete the entire board.

  • 3 Game mode
  • 5 Board sizes
  • 7 different clues
  • 45 world competitions
  • 3 languages : English, French and Breton
  • Infinite number of games!

Difficulty increase as you play.

Beat your own record and maybe you can be closer from the top 10!

logic, observation, accuracy and speed : all is important!

(Egalement disponible : Vidéo de présentation en français!)

Warning : interaction differ on Desktop version from mobile version!

Use left click to validate or right click to invalidate an element!
